name: Lou Rio King
tagline: Senior Full‑Stack Engineer • Distributed Systems • React/Node/AWS
summary: Experienced Senior Full‑Stack Engineer with 10+ years in software development. Known for delivering high‑quality, reliable, and scalable software solutions, with strong experience in web applications, event‑driven architectures, and cloud platforms.

highlights: Led development of scalable web applications using React, Node.js, Ruby on Rails, and AWS.
Architected distributed systems using event‑driven patterns and complex API workflows.
Built cloud‑based, scalable architectures with AWS SNS/SQS, CloudWatch, and Lambda.
Implemented unit + integration testing to keep code clean, testable, and reliable.
Partnered with cross‑functional teams to shape features and ship high‑quality releases.
Built and maintained high‑performance front‑end systems with React + TypeScript.
Spearheaded CI/CD pipeline automation to reduce deployment time and improve productivity.
Developed internal APIs with scalable, maintainable architecture practices.
Improved performance through database query optimization (PostgreSQL/MongoDB).
Delivered user‑facing features with JavaScript, Ember.js, Ruby on Rails, and PostgreSQL.
Led testing initiatives for a mission‑critical real‑estate platform.
Collaborated with product + design to ship polished, user‑focused experiences.
Improved developer workflow and reduced defects across the stack.
Built responsive interfaces with HTML/CSS/JavaScript in close collaboration with design.
Enhanced interactivity with jQuery to improve UX.
Developed a custom CMS using PHP + MySQL for content and user management.
Integrated third‑party APIs (e.g., Stripe/PayPal) for payments and authentication.

projects.title: Event‑Driven API Platform (AWS SNS/SQS)
projects.subtitle: Distributed systems • Reliability • Scale
projects.description: Designed event‑driven workflows to orchestrate complex API integrations, focusing on throughput, observability, and fault‑tolerance.

projects.title: CI/CD Automation & Release Tooling
projects.subtitle: Deployment speed • Quality gates
projects.description: Automated build/test/deploy pipelines to shorten release cycles while enforcing test and quality checks for safer production pushes.

projects.title: High‑Performance Frontend System
projects.subtitle: React + TypeScript • UX performance
projects.description: Built and optimized frontend features for responsiveness and maintainability, using modern React patterns and robust testing.

projects.title: Custom CMS + Payments Integration
projects.subtitle: PHP/MySQL • Stripe/PayPal
projects.description: Delivered a CMS for client content management and integrated payment + auth flows with third‑party APIs.
